```js
...
<?php
if (!is_admin()) {//checking for is_admin makes sure that the UI doesn't load in admin
//requires jquery AND the ui-core
wp_enqueue_script("jquery-ui-dialog",
array('jquery','jquery-ui-core'));
}//end of is_admin()
?>
...

```

...
